description: The purpose of this table is to record a daily snapshot of the firms positions along with PL (Profit and Loss), Attribution, Exposure, Alpha and advisor tags and other factors. There are 4 funds in the firm Rockhampton, Yaraka and Canoona, with the following respective codes RH, YA and CA. Some columns like Attribution, Alpha, SectorAlpha and Exposure are prefixed with the fund codes. Unless a value column augmentd with _USD the value is assumed to be in JPY. Some performance indicators: TPX Sector Alpha: Attribution - (Exposure * TPX Sector return), Alpha: Attribution - (Exposure * Beta * TPX return), Outperformance (Outperform/OP): Attribution - (Exposure * TPX return). If side is S then values will need to be multiplied by -1 if calculating the net but not for gross. If someone asked what is the attribution, alpha or exposure without specifying fund, the values per fund should be returned. If someone mentions (fund) RPA they are referring to LR.

columns.name: portfolioResponsibilitiesID
columns.description: a unique identifier (Primary Index)

columns.name: instrumentID
columns.description: A foreign key into the instrument table (hkg02p.t01Instrument.instrumentID)

columns.name: blp
columns.description: An instrument identifier. Equal to the Bloomberg Ticker but assumes the instrument is JP so doesnt have the country code in the case of Japan instruments

columns.name: quick
columns.description: An instrument identifier. The 4 digit QUICK code

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the instrument in English

columns.name: processDate
columns.description: The day which the snapshot was processed for

columns.name: CCY
columns.description: The currency which the instrument can be purchased in. Relates to the exchange where the instrument is listed

columns.name: rate
columns.description: Not used

columns.name: groupName
columns.description: The TOPIX group identifier name

columns.name: side
columns.description: The Side of the position. Either S or L for Short or Long

columns.name: quantity
columns.description: The quantity of the position. The number of shares

columns.name: sessionID
columns.description: Not used

columns.name: firstTradeDateLong
columns.description: The first trade date for Long positions

columns.name: firstTradeDateShort
columns.description: The first trade date for Short positions

columns.name: rowStatusLong
columns.description: Not Used

columns.name: rowStatusShort
columns.description: Not Used

columns.name: startStockPrice
columns.description: The quantity weighted average stock price at which this position was taken in JPY

columns.name: startStockPriceLocal
columns.description: The quantity weighted average stock price at which this position was taken in local currency

columns.name: mktPrice
columns.description: The price of the stock on the processDate

columns.name: startTopixPrice
columns.description: The price of the Topix index when the position was first taken

columns.name: mktTopixPrice
columns.description: The price of the Topix index when the position at the pricessDate

columns.name: relPerfVsTPX
columns.description: The relative performance of the stock relative to the Topix as a percentage

columns.name: RHExposure
columns.description: The exposure of the position in the RH (Rockhampton) fund

columns.name: YAExposure
columns.description: The exposure of the position in the YA (Yaraka) fund

columns.name: LRExposure
columns.description: The exposure of the position in the LR (RPA) fund

columns.name: CAExposure
columns.description: The exposure of the position in the CA (Canoona) fund

columns.name: advisor
columns.description: An advisor tag. Specifies the position analyst

columns.name: strategy
columns.description: An advisor tag. Specifies the position strategy

columns.name: sensitivity
columns.description: An advisor tag. Specifies the position sensitivity

columns.name: sector
columns.description: An advisor tag. Specifies the position sector

columns.name: catalyst
columns.description: An advisor tag. Specifies the position catalyst

columns.name: weight
columns.description: The weighting that this position attributes its PL to

columns.name: liquidity
columns.description: The liquidity of the stock

columns.name: volatility_10D
columns.description: The 10D moving average stock price volatility

columns.name: attribution
columns.description: The daily attribution on the processDate

columns.name: RHPL
columns.description: The daily PL in JPY for the RH (Rockhampton) fund with dividend Included

columns.name: YAPL
columns.description: The daily PL in JPY for the YA (Yaraka) fund with dividend Included

columns.name: CAPL

columns.name: YAPL_LOCAL
columns.description: The daily PL in local currency for the YA (Yaraka) fund with dividend included

columns.name: LRPL_LOCAL
columns.description: The daily PL in local currency for the LR (RPA) fund with dividend included

columns.name: CAPL_LOCAL
columns.description: The daily PL in local currency for the CA (Canoona) fund with dividend included

columns.name: RHPL_USD
columns.description: The daily PL in USD for the RH (Rockhampton) fund

columns.name: YAPL_USD
columns.description: The daily PL in USD for the YA (Yaraka) fund

columns.name: LRPL_USD
columns.description: The daily PL in USD for the LR (RPA) fund

columns.name: CAPL_USD

columns.name: CANAV

columns.name: YANAV_USD

columns.name: LRNAV_USD

columns.name: YANAVMonthend
columns.description: The previous month end NAV for the YA (Yaraka) fund in JPY

columns.name: LRNAVMonthend
columns.description: The previous month end NAV for the LR (RPA) fund in JPY

columns.name: CANAVMonthend
columns.description: The previous month end NAV for the CA (Canoona) fund in JPY

columns.description: The daily Attribution for the RH (Rockhampton) fund in JPY

columns.description: The daily Attribution for the YA (Yaraka) fund in JPY

columns.name: LRAttribution

columns.name: CAAttribution
columns.description: The daily Attribution for the CA (Canoona) fund in JPY

columns.name: attributionStatus
columns.description: The frequency at which the attribution is computed at. Most stocks/positions set to DAILY

columns.name: relIndexID
columns.description: A Foreign key into the Index table. (hkg02p.t07Index.indexID)

columns.name: relIndexChange

columns.name: YAMktOutPerformance
columns.description: The daily outperformance (Attribution - (Exposure * Topix return)) of the position in YA (Yaraka)

columns.name: LRMktOutPerformance
columns.description: The daily outperformance (Attribution - (Exposure * Topix return)) of the position in LR (RPA)

columns.name: CAMktOutPerformance
columns.description: The daily outperformance (Attribution - (Exposure * Topix return)) of the position in CA (Canoona)

columns.name: beta
columns.description: The assigned Beta of the stock/ticker

columns.name: RHMktAlpha
columns.description: The daily alpha (Attribution - (Exposure * Beta)) of the position in RH (Rockhampton)

columns.name: YAMktAlpha
columns.description: The daily alpha (Attribution - (Exposure * Beta)) of the position in YA (Yaraka)

columns.name: LRMktAlpha
columns.description: The daily alpha (Attribution - (Exposure * Beta)) of the position in LR (RPA)

columns.name: CAMktAlpha
columns.description: The daily alpha (Attribution - (Exposure * Beta)) of the position in CA (Canoona)

columns.name: updateToday
columns.description: Not used

columns.name: updateQuantity

columns.name: TPX
columns.description: The Topix sector/group this instrument belongs to

columns.name: GICS
columns.description: The GIGS sector this instrument belongs to

columns.name: mktCap_JPY

columns.description: The PB (Prime Broker) at which this position is held

columns.name: crowding_processDate
columns.description: Not used

columns.name: change_in_crowding_composite

columns.name: crowding_short_interest_rank_inverse_topix500
columns.description: CITI crowding short interest rank vs. Topix 500 index

columns.name: nextEarningsForecastDate

columns.name: nextEarningsForecastDaysTil
columns.description: The number of days until the next (up coming) earnings forecast

columns.name: RHMktAlphaSector

columns.name: YAMktAlphaSector

columns.name: dividendOnlyPL

columns.name: lupdate
columns.description: A timestamp when this entry was updated in the DB
